name: Viking Brothers
description: By the horns of your helmet, this is a Viking adventure you'll never forget! Join two brothers as they set off across a battle-scarred kingdom to drive off savages, restore their land, and search for the magic items that will breathe new life into their once magnificent realm!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® XP, Windows Vista®, Windows® 7, Windows® 8 Processor: Pentium processor (or equivalent AMD® processor) 2.0 GHz or faster Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX® compatible video card Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® compatible sound card

reviews.review_text: This game was incredible boring without any challenge or pressure at all - even toddlers would get bored. It feels like playing a point and click game without use of brain. There is a timer in the game, however the timer never get anywhere near running out. The music is awful, the sfx ok, the gfx fine, encountered a few bugs. All in all, not worth money.

By the horns of your helmet, this is a Viking adventure you'll never forget! Join two brothers as they set off across a battle-scarred kingdom to drive off savages, restore their land, and search for the magic items that will breathe new life into their once magnificent realm!
